author: @KCBD11
title: Lubbock firefighters gear up for 48-hour charity run
text: Lubbock firefighters gear up for 48-hour charity run LUBBOCK, Texas (KCBD) - Many in the Lubbock community are lacing up their running shoes for the 4X4X48 charity run. This race is unique, challenging participants to run four miles every four hours for an entire 48-hour period. ‚ÄúAnyone who participates in it, it‚Äôs going to be mentally and physically challenging,‚Äù Lubbock Firefighter Noah Sager, who is participating in the run, said. Sager stated his job requires constant training. ‚ÄúI think what were asked to do on the job does help in this aspect,‚Äù Sager said. However, he does not underestimate the challenges of this race. ‚ÄúA little bit of extra training on your own time does help.‚Äù The [Lubbock Professional Firefighter Association](https://www.facebook.com/LPFFA972) has a goal of $5,000 that will go towards firefighter wellness. ‚ÄúIn the past, firefighter mental health has been overlooked,‚Äù Sager said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre trying to be proactive for our current brothers and sisters in the department.‚Äù These firefighters put their lives on the line for the community everyday, so this is the community‚Äôs chance to give a little in return. ‚ÄúCounseling, treatment centers and other mental health endeavors,‚Äù Sager said. ‚ÄúSo, any money that we receive goes to that and so I just say thank you.‚Äù Sager said those who want to join the run can just jump in when they see these firefighters. ‚ÄúAny member of the public is welcome to join,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no fee to register or participate, just hop in with us, but donations are encouraged.‚Äù Those interested can join the firefighters on their run at Tech Terrance park during these days and times. Or, they are taking donations [here.](https://www.gofundme.com/f/lpffa-4x4x48-marathon?utm_campaign=p_cp+share-sheet&utm_content=control1&utm_medium=copy_link_all&utm_source=customer) Copyright 2024 KCBD. All rights reserved.

author: BVM Sportsdesk
title: Cadeau Shines in Key Moment, Leading Heels to NCAA Victory
text:
Cadeau Shines in Key Moment, Leading Heels to NCAA Victory
Elliot Cadeau delivered a standout performance in North Carolina's 95-68 victory over San Diego State in the NCAA Tournament, showcasing his ability to control the game. He orchestrated UNC's offense and played surprisingly strong defense, setting the rhythm for the team. With a significant early contribution, including 5 points and 2 assists, Cadeau led UNC on a decisive 20-2 run to take charge of the game. His experience is evident as he continues to mature in postseason play, finishing the night with 12 assists and only 2 turnovers.
- Cadeau recorded 12 assists, tying for the second most in an NCAA Tournament game for UNC.
- In his last four postseason games, Cadeau has 30 assists with just 7 turnovers.
- Cadeau has steadily improved his performance as the tournament progresses.
- UNC has won five of the six games where Cadeau recorded at least 10 assists this season.
Cadeau's emerging confidence suggests he will continue to play a crucial role as UNC advances in the tournament. His ability to control the tempo may be vital for the team's success in upcoming matchups.
Bottom LineElliot Cadeau's growth as a playmaker is transforming him into a key asset for the Tar Heels during the NCAA Tournament, emphasizing that when he's in control, UNC elevates its performance, making him indispensable for their title hopes.
Read more at HeelIllustrated

author: DH Web Desk
title: Indian Army apprehends PoK resident and Lashkar-e-Taiba guide in Poonch
text:
The Indian Army on Friday apprehended a Pakistan occupied Kashmir resident and Lashkar-e-Taiba terror group guide identified as Zaher Hussein Shah in Poonch, ANI reported quoting the police.

.

Meanwhile, Pak Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif had earlier this month urged India to resolve the Kashmir issue via dialogue as Pakistan marked the fifth anniversary of the abrogation of Article 370, which provided special status to Jammu and Kashmir.

The Indian government abrogated Article 370, along with Article 35A, on August 5, 2019, and the erstwhile state of Jammu and Kashmir was bifurcated into two Union Territories -- Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh.

Pakistan designated August 5 as 'Youm-i-Istehsal' in 2020 and observes the day annually to register its protest to the Indian action.

"India must move from dispute denial to dispute resolution" in the interest of lasting peace and security in South Asia, Sharif said in a televised address to lawmakers in Muzaffarabad, the capital of Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK).

(With PTI inputs)

author: Robby Payne
title: New Jupiter 'Dawn to Dusk' Chromebook Plus wallpaper and screensaver is pretty sweet
text:
One of my favorite little perks of the Chromebook Plus ecosystem has always been the exclusive ‚ÄúDawn to Dusk‚Äù wallpapers and screen savers. It‚Äôs a simple, elegant feature: you pick a theme, and your wallpaper subtly changes its lighting throughout the day to match the time, while the screen saver provides a beautiful, slow animation of the same scene.
The only problem? For the nearly two years since this feature debuted, we‚Äôve only had two options to choose from. Thankfully, that has finally changed. A gorgeous new third option has arrived, and it takes us on a journey to the largest planet in our solar system: Jupiter.
A stunning new view of Jupiter I‚Äôm a sucker for great space imagery, and this new wallpaper does not disappoint. The new ‚ÄúJupiter‚Äù theme gives you a stunning, high-resolution view of the gas giant, and seeing it subtly change throughout the day is a real treat. In the morning, you‚Äôll see the light begin to creep across the planet‚Äôs surface, and as your day progresses, that light source shifts, highlighting different storms and bands in the iconic atmosphere. It‚Äôs a beautiful, dynamic way to liven up your desktop.
Don‚Äôt forget the animated screen saver The screen saver is just as impressive. When your Chromebook goes idle, you‚Äôre treated to a gentle, slow-moving animation of the planet. The subtle rotation and the fun animations make for a serene and visually captivating screen saver that is far more interesting than a simple slideshow of photos.
This is a fantastic and long-overdue addition to a feature I really love; and one I hope that is the beginning of far more of this treatment. It‚Äôs a small thing, for sure, but these kinds of thoughtful, high-quality visual touches are what make the overall Chromebook Plus experience feel more premium and personalized. If you have a Chromebook Plus, I highly recommend you head into your Wallpaper & Style settings (just righ-click on your desktop) and give this new theme a look.

author: RT en Espa√±ol
title: Al menos un herido deja choques entre manifestantes y polic√≠as frente al Congreso de Argentina
text: Segundo d√≠a de choques afueras del Congreso argentino por el debate de 'ley √≥mnibus' Una nueva jornada de tensiones y choques entre centenares de manifestantes y efectivos de las fuerzas de seguridad se repitieron este jueves en los alrededores del Congreso argentino, tras la escandalosa jornada que se vivi√≥ el mi√©rcoles desde tempranas horas de la ma√±ana. Las fuerzas policiales desplegaron sus acciones represivas y algunos de los agentes, incluso, arrebataron banderas que levantaban los manifestantes en medio de las [protestas](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497677-aumenta-tension-afueras-congreso-argentino-omnibus) que se desarrollan en la ciudad de Buenos Aires, la capital del pa√≠s. En el segundo d√≠a de manifestaciones multitudinarias contra el plan de negocios del gobierno que est√°n vendiendo en el Congreso de la Naci√≥n, la Polic√≠a de la Ciudad se une a las fuerzas represivas y agreden a los manifestantes‚Äî ùï¨ ùñë ùñä üá¶üá∑ ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (@AleRMazzei) [#LaLibertad] [pic.twitter.com/25NWr5y5kT] [February 1, 2024] Entre las im√°genes difundidas por [medios locales](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cb12KmMMDJA), tambi√©n se pudo observar que un manifestante result√≥ herido en medio de los choques, y termin√≥ ensangrentado y tendido en el piso, mientras lo atend√≠an sus compa√±eros en una de las √°reas abiertas donde se desarrollan los hechos. Luego de esto, llegaron equipos m√©dicos que llevaron al hombre a una ambulancia. "Estaba haciendo mi trabajo" üó£Ô∏èüî¥Un fot√≥grafo y el notero de C5N baleados por la polic√≠a.üìπC5N‚Äî El Destape (@eldestapeweb) [https://t.co/HBqgUdR7Wr] [pic.twitter.com/dCdMDApIox] [February 2, 2024] Adem√°s, el Sistema de Atenci√≥n M√©dica de Emergencias (SAME) traslad√≥ a un gendarme herido por el enfrentamiento con militantes, [informaron](https://www.mdzol.com/politica/2024/2/1/tension-en-el-congreso-el-same-traslada-un-gendarme-herido-por-el-enfrentamiento-con-militantes-402913.html) medios locales. üì¢ Ley √ìmnibus: m√°xima tensi√≥n en la puerta del CongresoHay un detenido. üëâ Segu√≠ en‚Äî A24.com (@A24COM) [#Qui√©nCu√°ndoD√≥nde]üì∫ [https://t.co/3gt6dzr3tG]. [pic.twitter.com/dETSeKUQzQ] [February 1, 2024] Por su parte, el dirigente del Polo Obrero, Eduardo Belliboni, as√≠ como en la v√≠spera, se descompuso en las afueras del Congreso. En horas de la noche fue atendido tras permanecer en el suelo. üá¶üá∑ | AHORA: El dirigente piquetero Eduardo Belliboni es atendido, por segundo d√≠a consecutivo, por manifestantes tras agresi√≥n policial en medio de protestas.‚Äî Alerta News 24 (@AlertaNews24) [pic.twitter.com/TJE84s1dx2] [February 2, 2024] En otro instante incluso se muestra el momento en que efectivos de Gendarmer√≠a increparon a un jubilado con bast√≥n mientras respond√≠a las preguntas de una periodista. üö®Efectivos de Gendarmer√≠a increparon a un jubilado con bast√≥n.‚Äî Noticias Argentinas (@NAagencia) [pic.twitter.com/jZdedzMp14] [February 1, 2024] Las inmediaciones del Parlamento siguen fuertemente custodiadas por agentes de [Gendarmer√≠a](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497688-gendarme-argentino-llevar-logo-prohibido-foto) Nacional y de la Polic√≠a Federal, quienes adem√°s cuentan con equipos antimotines, camiones blindados e hidrantes antidisturbios para reprimir las protestas. Los uniformados, que cada vez son m√°s, han replegado de la acera y la cercan√≠a del Congreso a los manifestantes. ‚Äî IP noticias (@_IPNoticias) [#AHORA]üî¥ Se trata la Ley √ìmnibus en el Congreso: la Gendarmer√≠a avanza sobre los manifestantes. [pic.twitter.com/gHCi1CbiK0] [February 1, 2024] En un momento de m√°xima tensi√≥n, se observa c√≥mo los gendarmes usaron sus palos para reprimir a los manifestantes en un enfrentamiento directo. Empez√≥ la represi√≥n en las afueras del CongresoLa polic√≠a reprimi√≥ a manifestantes tirando gases y golpeando a manifestantes que ni siquiera estaban cortando la calle. Tambi√©n secuestraron banderas.‚Äî ANRed #25A√±os (@Red__Accion) [pic.twitter.com/ooaLRZG4rh] [February 1, 2024] Alta tensi√≥n En el lugar, los uniformados lanzaron gases lacrim√≥genos, mientras desde la fila de los descontentos tiraron botellas y palos. üö® Fuerte represi√≥n en las puertas del Congreso de la Naci√≥n. üìπ‚Äî Feminacida (@Feminacida) [@Marco_Teruggi] [pic.twitter.com/MbtdasdmOl] [February 1, 2024] Los hechos se registraron mientras a lo interno del legislativo, los senadores [continuaban](https://actualidad.rt.com/actualidad/497784-verguenza-llueven-insultos-sesion-ley-omnibus-argentina) con las discusiones sobre la controvertida ' [ley √≥mnibus](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497784-verguenza-llueven-insultos-sesion-ley-omnibus-argentina)' que busca aprobar el gobierno libertario de Javier Milei. ‚Äî ANRed #25A√±os (@Red__Accion) [#AHORA] [#Congreso]Mientras se desarrolla la segunda jornada de debate de la Ley √ìmnibus en el Congreso de la Naci√≥n, en las afueras contin√∫an las protestas.La polic√≠a reprime a los manifestantes y agrede a un hombre en silla de ruedas. [pic.twitter.com/1OflXforr0] [February 1, 2024] Mientras tanto, los manifestantes que bordeaban la sede parlamentaria, continuaron expresando su rechazo total al proyecto legal y dem√°s [ajustes](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497764-argentina-milei-ecomonia-ley-omnibus) propuestos por [Milei](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497775-fmi-desembolso-argentina-destaca-plan-estabilizacion), al denunciar que se trata de un retroceso sobre los derechos consagrados en la Constituci√≥n. ‚Äî Prensa Obrera (@prensaobrera) [#GRAVE]Se ve que los manifestantes se se encuentran sobre la plaza y la polic√≠a avanza sobre ellos. El gobierno miente, no est√°n impidiendo que se corte la calle, est√°n pretendiendo impedir que nos manifestemos. No lo podemos permitir.Ven√≠ al [#Congreso] [#noalaleyomnibus] [https://t.co/QafvJWN818] [pic.twitter.com/zGU1cw4GA8] [February 1, 2024] El medio local Anred report√≥ que un hombre en silla de ruedas result√≥ agredido por los oficiales. As√≠ era la concentraci√≥n minutos antes de la provocaci√≥n policial: totalmente pacifica.‚Äî lavaca tuitera (@Lavacatuitera) [#LeyOmnibus] [pic.twitter.com/CW8HxhRroV] [February 1, 2024] Por su parte, Prensa Obrera inform√≥ que los manifestantes que se encontraban en una plaza cercana al [Congreso](https://esrt.space/actualidad/497753-camara-diputados-argentina-reanuda-sesion-jornada-escandalosa) fueron agredidos con el avance de cordones policiales sobre el lugar donde se encontraban aglomerados. En otra de las im√°genes se conoci√≥ la detenci√≥n de un manifestante que los presentes lograron identificar como Mat√≠as Avalos, mientras le ped√≠an que gritaran su nombre cuando era llevado tomado de manos por los polic√≠as. Otro medio local tambi√©n divulg√≥ im√°genes sobre c√≥mo los manifestantes se encontraban de manera pac√≠fica ejerciendo el derecho a la protesta, momentos antes que comenzara la represi√≥n policial. Nicol√°s del Ca√±o, diputado y dirigente del Partido de los Trabajadores Socialistas (PTS), denunci√≥ que, adem√°s de los gases, los uniformados habr√≠an lanzado balas de goma. üî¥AHORA: avanza gendarmer√≠a sobre manifestantesNicol√°s del Ca√±o, diputado: "Est√°n desalojando y reprimiendo""La Constituci√≥n permite que la gente se manifieste libremente"Cc‚Äî Am√©rica TV (@AmericaTV) [#Am√©ricaNoticias] [@rolandogps] [@lucianarias] [pic.twitter.com/KuXdbMxDps] [February 1, 2024] "La Constituci√≥n permite que la gente se manifieste libremente", expres√≥ el legislador, ante la negativa de la Gendarmer√≠a a su petici√≥n de permitir la protesta en las inmediaciones del Congreso. Acusan de "romper el pa√≠s" Tambi√©n dijo que la ministra de Seguridad de la Naci√≥n, Patricia Bullrich, promotora del [protocolo](https://actualidad.rt.com/actualidad/493005-movimientos-sociales-argentina-desafiar-protocolo-antipiquetes) 'antipiquetes', "quiere reprimir al pueblo, pasando por encima de la Constituci√≥n". Desde la Confederaci√≥n General del Trabajo (CGT) han [denunciado](https://twitter.com/cgtoficialok/status/1753178138031292902) que el despliegue de fuerzas federales "solo pretende ocultar lo verdaderamente importante que es la discusi√≥n legislativa" y amedrenta "la libertad de protesta". "Mientras tanto los argentinos/as est√°n inseguros en los barrios de Argentina", a√±ade la organizaci√≥n sindical en su cuenta en X. Entretanto, el ministro de Econom√≠a, Luis Caputo, [asever√≥](https://twitter.com/LuisCaputoAR/status/1753204550083785083) en un escueto mensaje publicado en la red social que "romper el pa√≠s y gritar es lo √∫nico que saben hacer". Si te ha gustado, ¬°comp√°rtelo con tus amigos!

author: ET Online
title: Nacreous clouds: Scotland witnesses rare "rainbow cloud" sunrise; The video will leave you mesmerized - The Economic Times
text: Scotland residents were recently treated to a rare and enchanting natural light display featuring shimmering rainbow clouds gracing the sky. This phenomenon, identified as Nacreous or Mother of Pearl clouds, occurred near Nairn Beach on Christmas Eve, casting a vibrant spectacle shortly after sunrise around 9 am. A 29 year old photographer Joshua Earle captured this extraordinary event and shared a video on his Instagram account. Earle in the caption expressed his awe, stating, These incredible clouds have been appearing across the UK this week. This video was taken near Nairn Beach at around 9:00 am this morning. I still can't wrap my head around what I'm seeing! Nature is simply amazing. He explained that the phenomenon also known as Polar Stratospheric Clouds occurs due to high arctic clouds containing tiny ice crystals that refract sunlight. It's worth keeping an eye out at sunrise and sunset this weekend if you're in the UK. You might just spot a rainbow cloud! Earle added, encouraging others to witness this rare celestial spectacle. The photographer noted that the vibrant clouds adorned the horizon, creating shimmering rainbows within the clouds. Although it was his first encounter with these clouds, they had appeared three or four times in the week leading up to Christmas Eve.The Instagram video gained immense popularity, reaching over 3.8 million views and 272,000 likes. Users shared their fascination, offering scientific explanations and personal stories.

author: Greg Norman
title: Justice Department finds Phoenix Police have used excessive force, discriminated against minorities | Fox News
text:
The Justice Department announced Thursday that police in Phoenix have been engaging in conduct that violates the Constitution and federal law by using "excessive force" and discriminating against Black, Hispanic and Native American people, among other actions.
A "comprehensive investigation" into the Phoenix Police Department has uncovered that it and the city "unlawfully detain, cite, and arrest people experiencing homelessness and unlawfully dispose of their belongings," as well as "discriminate against people with behavioral health disabilities when dispatching calls for assistance and responding to people in crisis," the Justice Department says.
"The Justice Department has concluded there is reasonable cause to believe that the City of Phoenix and the Phoenix Police Department engage in a pattern or practice of conduct that deprives its residents and visitors, including Black, Hispanic, and Native American people, of their rights under the Constitution and federal law," Attorney General Merrick Garland said in a statement.
"The release of today‚Äôs findings report is an important step toward accountability and transparency, and we are committed to working with the City of Phoenix and Phoenix Police Department on meaningful reform that protects the civil rights and safety of Phoenix residents and strengthens police-community trust."
ARIZONA POLICE OFFICER KILLED BY GUNMAN WHILE RESPONDING TO ‚ÄòDISTURBANCE‚Äô
The Justice Department says it began investigating Phoenix law enforcement in August 2021 and based its findings on interviews, police interactions, thousands of documents and hundreds of hours of body-worn camera footage.
It said it found Phoenix Police to use "excessive force, including unjustified deadly force and other types of force."
LOUISVILLE POLICE ENTER NEGOTIATIONS WITH JUSTICE DEPARTMENT AFTER REPORT ON RACIAL DISCRIMINATION
"The police also used excessive force, delayed necessary medical aid and infringed on the civil rights of those engaged in First Amendment-protected conduct, including demonstrations and protests," Assistant Attorney General Kristen Clarke said.
"Consistent with its standard practice in investigations of other cities, the Department provided a detailed briefing on the findings to the City and PhxPD on Tuesday, and proposed that the parties agree in principle to negotiate expeditiously and in good faith to reach a comprehensive court-enforceable settlement with independent monitoring," the Justice Department added.
